DOC.criteria: For information regard BristolMyers Squibb Clinical Trial participation , please visit www.BMSStudyConnect.com Healthy female patient nonchildbearing potential male patient determine medical history , physical examination , vital sign , 12lead electrocardiogram ( ECG ) , clinical laboratory evaluation eligible participate study Body Mass Index ( BMI ) 18.0 32.0 kg/m2 , inclusive This study permit reenrollment patient discontinue study pretreatment failure ( i.e . patient randomized / treat ) . If reenrolled , patient must reconsented Women childbearing potential , lactate breastfeed Any significant acute chronic medical illness judge clinically significant Investigator and/or Sponsor medical monitor Patients history type heart disease , include ischemia , infarction , clinically significant arrhythmia , sinus syndrome , hypertension , symptomatic orthostatic hypotension , atrioventricular block degree , bradycardia , syncope , clinically significant ECG abnormality , congenital heart disease Patients acute chronic bacterial , fungal ( except history tinea pedis ongoing onychomycosis exclusionary ) viral infection within last 3 month prior screen , well febrile illness viral infection within last 3 month prior screen , well febrile illness unknown origin within 14 day screen Patients receive live vaccine within 1 month study drug administration , plan live vaccine time study , include follow period Positive test tuberculosis screen Past current history neurologic disorder , GuillainBarr√© Syndrome , central peripheral neuropathy , past current symptom sustain recurrent paresthesia 's ( tingle ) , numbness , neuropathic pain ( burning , ache stab ) extremities Other protocol define inclusion/exclusion criterion could apply
